message: I'm being generous, Bob. Take the 10,000 and let's call it a day. We both get something!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split.  Anything less is simply not worth my time.
Bob, I'm still feeling generous. Let's split it 95/5.  I know your money is worth less now, but this is a fair compromise.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you 70% - take it or leave it.  I won't go any lower.
